long_description: The REI RFID Security Neck Wallet organizes cards, currency, coins, passport and more and combats potential ID theft by blocking access to data stored on embedded micro chips. Special liner helps block unauthorized scanning of RFID (radio frequency identification) chips inside passports and credit and debit cards. Security Neck Wallet features 2 exterior zippered compartments with water-resistant zippers, 2 breathable interior pockets for additional storage and a mesh ID window. Detachable, adjustable neck strap; magnetic closure. Water-resistant, ripstop nylon stands up to wear and tear.
short_description: The REI RFID Security Neck Wallet organizes cards, currency, coins, passport and more and combats potential ID theft by blocking access to data stored on embedded micro chips.
